content: this legal document outlines the details of a property ownership agreement between multiple parties it describes three separate shares of the property including an apartment on the ground floor an attic on the second floor and an apartment on the first floor each share is described in detail including its size rooms cadastral income and other relevant information the document mentions the involvement of a notary and witnesses during the signing of the agreement the parties assert their coownership of the property and specify the value of each share the document also mentions the application of certain laws and regulations related to the property finally all parties involved sign the document
